alert.note: Alert for Marion; Morgan (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 08 at 11:06AM EST until March 09 at 11:40PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... White River and Eel River. .Ongoing flooding will continue along portions of the East Fork White, White, and Wabash Rivers and their tributaries. River stages are rising again due to previous rainfall over the weekend. Minor flooding is expected, which primarily impacts river roads, parks, and agricultural land. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River near Nora. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, White River begins to back up into Mystic Bay and cause the lake level to rise. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 12.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM EST Tuesday was 12.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.2 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued this evening by around 1115 PM EST /1015 PM CST/.
